about.title: Our Story
about.body: Founded in 2015 by certified groomer Jennifer Martinez, PetCare Plus has become the trusted name for professional pet care in our community. Our team of certified, bonded, and insured pet care specialists treats every pet like family.
about.subtitle: Why choose PetCare Plus

owner.name: Jennifer Martinez
owner.title: Owner & Master Groomer
owner.bio: Certified by the National Dog Groomers Association with 15+ years of experience. Jennifer specializes in gentle handling and stress-free grooming for all breeds.

products.name: Full Grooming Service
products.description: Complete grooming including bath, haircut, nail trim, ear cleaning, and brush out. Premium shampoo included.

products.name: Bath & Brush
products.description: Refreshing bath with premium shampoo, thorough brush out, and nail trim

products.name: Dog Walking (30 min)
products.description: Individual 30-minute walk with water break and treats. Perfect for daily exercise.

products.name: Dog Walking (60 min)
products.description: Extended 60-minute walk for high-energy dogs. Includes playtime and water break.

products.name: Overnight Pet Sitting
products.description: 24-hour in-home care with feeding, walking, playtime, and lots of love. Includes overnight stay.

products.name: Daily Pet Visits
products.description: 30-minute home visit for feeding, playtime, and care. Perfect for cats and small pets.

products.name: Nail Trim Only
products.description: Quick nail trim service for dogs and cats. No appointment needed for existing clients.

products.name: Cat Grooming
products.description: Gentle grooming for cats including bath, brush, nail trim, and mat removal if needed.

testimonials.title: What Pet Parents Say
testimonials.subtitle: Real reviews from our satisfied clients

items.text: Jennifer is amazing with my anxious rescue dog! He actually gets excited when we pull up to PetCare Plus now. Her gentle approach made all the difference.
items.author: Sarah Mitchell

items.text: Michael took care of our cat and two dogs while we were on vacation. Photo updates every day and our pets were so happy when we got home!
items.author: Robert Johnson

items.text: Best grooming service in town! My poodle always looks fantastic and the prices are very reasonable. Highly recommend!
items.author: Amanda Rodriguez

items.text: I trust PetCare Plus completely with my senior dog. They're gentle, patient, and really care about his comfort. Worth every penny!
items.author: David Chen

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our services

items.question: Are you insured and bonded?
items.answer: Yes! We carry full general liability insurance and all team members are bonded for your protection. We can provide proof of insurance upon request.

items.question: What pets do you care for?
items.answer: We care for dogs, cats, birds, rabbits, guinea pigs, and most small animals. If you have an exotic pet, please call us to discuss their specific needs.

items.question: Can I meet the groomer/sitter before booking?
items.answer: Absolutely! We require a meet-and-greet for all new clients. This helps us get to know your pet's personality and any special needs, and ensures you're comfortable with our team.

items.question: What if my pet has special needs or anxiety?
items.answer: We're experienced with anxious pets, senior animals, and those with medical needs. We use gentle, fear-free techniques and can administer medications with proper instructions.

items.question: Do you offer photo updates?
items.answer: Yes! We send photo updates during grooming appointments and multiple times per day for sitting services. You'll always know your pet is happy and safe.

items.question: What's your cancellation policy?
items.answer: We require 24 hours notice for cancellations or rescheduling. Late cancellations may incur a 50% service fee.

items.question: Do you have a grooming facility or come to my home?
items.answer: We have a professional grooming facility for all grooming services. For pet sitting, we come to your home so your pets can stay in their comfortable environment.

items.question: Are your groomers certified?
items.answer: Yes! Our groomers are certified by the National Dog Groomers Association (NDGA) and all team members are Pet First Aid and CPR certified.
